Package com.bonitasoft.engine.api

Interface LogAPI

public interface LogAPI
When some actions are performed in Bonita Execution Engine, some business logs are stored.
The LogAPI allows to get / search those logs.

The stored logs depend on which bonita objects have been enabled for logging (this is configurable in bonita-home configuration files)

Author:
Bole Zhang, Matthieu Chaffotte, Emmanuel Duchastenier
See Also:
  • "QueriableLoggerService implementations and configuration (in bonita-home)"

  • Method Details

    • getLog

      Log getLog(long logId) throws LogNotFoundException
      Retrieves the log.
      Parameters:
      logId - the identifier of the log
      Returns:
      the role
      Throws:
      LogNotFoundException - If the log identifier does not refer to an existing log
      RetrieveException - If an exception occurs during the role retrieving
      InvalidSessionException - If the session is invalid (expired, unknown, ...)
      Since:
      6.0

    • getNumberOfLogs

      int getNumberOfLogs()
      Returns the total number of logs.
      Returns:
      the total number of logs
      Throws:
      RetrieveException - If an exception occurs during the count retrieving
      InvalidSessionException - If the session is invalid (expired, unknown, ...)
      Since:
      6.0

    • getLogs

      List<Log> getLogs(int startIndex, int maxResults, LogCriterion criterion)
      Retrieves the paginated list of logs.

      It retrieves from the startIndex to the startIndex + maxResults.

      Parameters:
      startIndex - the start index
      maxResults - the max number of logs
      criterion - the sorting criterion
      Returns:
      the paginated list of logs
      Throws:
      RetrieveException - If an exception occurs during the log retrieving
      InvalidSessionException - If the session is invalid (expired, unknown, ...)
      Since:
      6.0

    • searchLogs

      SearchResult<Log> searchLogs(SearchOptions searchOptions) throws SearchException
      Searches logs according to the criteria containing in the options.
      Parameters:
      searchOptions - the search criteria
      Returns:
      the search result
      Throws:
      SearchException - If an exception occurs during the log searching
      InvalidSessionException - If the session is invalid (expired, unknown, ...)
      Since:
      6.0
